009package imagingbook.common.color;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.NamedResource;
012
013public enum IccProfile implements NamedResource {
014        AdobeRGB1998("AdobeRGB1998.icc"),
015        CIERGB("CIERGB.icc"),
016        PAL_SECAM("PAL_SECAM.icc"),
017        SMPTE_C("SMPTE-C.icc"),
018        VideoHD("VideoHD.icc"),
019        VideoNTSC("VideoNTSC.icc"),
020        VideoPAL("VideoPAL.icc");
021
022        private final String filename;
023
024        IccProfile(String filename) {
025                this.filename = filename;
026        }
027
028        @Override
029        public String getFileName() {
030                return filename;
031        }
032
033}
